ItemSpec.value: hi, master, this is your new rented house after graduation. Empty house, how do you live? Go buy furniture!
hi, master, money spends over.How to do? Go to work, play your designer expertise.Then earn money to buy furniture.
I heard this work is very interesting, but also make money.Let's get started!
Congratulations, you won the challenge, gold coins reward 5000, go back and buy it!
Interesting work waiting for you, continue to challenge it! Earn to style the house beautiful and comfortable!
Remove the block with a shovel.
Start the game with a bomb and a rocket.
Start the game with a rainbow ball
The inside of the plane doubled.
Oh, you still need to collect:
By exchanging the locations of adjacent plots, the three blocks of the same color are matched.
Continue to match, and collect enough target blocks.
Match four tiles to see what happens.
That's great!You've got a rocket booster!You can launch it by exchanging it with an adjacent element.
Here are four more, let's make a rocket booster!
Double click on the booster, and you can detonate it.
Match these five blocks to see what happens.
This is a bomb booster.See what it does.
To make a bomb booster needs to match up to five tiles.
That's great. Let's get more booster.
Congratulations on making a small plane!Move it around.
Great. We need to make more planes through this.
Match these five blocks to see what happens.
This is a magic cube prop, the rubik's cube can eliminate all color blocks of the same color.
Remove a tile on the carpet and you can spread the carpet further.
Match the block in the chain to remove the chain.
The shovel can scoop up any block, not the number of moves.
Now shovel a block with a shovel.
Remove the next block of strawberries and collect the strawberries.
Congratulations on unlocking the new booster!
Use this free booster, a bomb and a rocket to start!
Use this free booster, a bomb and a rainbow ball!
The bread is all moved to the bottom, you can pass!
Use this free booster, a double plane!
Miss a day and you'll have to start over
Congratulations, you have completed all the levels.We will add new levels later, please look forward to it!
The function is not open, please look forward to!
Dear players, thank you for participating in the world's first simulated construction elimination game test.Welcome to our facebook page for comments and Suggestions.
Click here to open your candy world!
Please check the network status first.
Move this block, you can roll the carpet out!
Your lives has been restored. Start the game.
Input content does not meet the specified length!
Congratulations, you have completed all the levels.We will add new levels later, please look forward to it!
